question:
Which among the following mountains and the countries associated is/are correctly matched?
  1. Aoraki Mount Cook - Australia
  2. Mount Huang - China 
  3. Matterhorn - New York 
Select the correct code from the options given below:
explanation:
The Aoraki Mount Cook is the highest mountain in New Zealand. It reaches a height of 3754 metres. The word 'Aoraki' means Cloud Piercer.

Mount Huang also known as Huangshan or the Yellow Mountain is located in the eastern China. Lotus peak is the tallest peak in the Huangshan mountain range. 

Matterhorn is one of the highest peaks in the Alps. It is situated on the border between Italy and Switzerland. It is 4478 metres high. It is one of the deadliest peaks of the Alps.
